name: Death Saving Throw
description: When you start your turn with 0 Hit Points, you make a special saving throw called a Death Saving Throw. Roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, you succeed. Otherwise, you fail. Three successes: you become Stable. Three failures: you die. Rolling a 1 counts as two failures. Rolling a 20 means you regain 1 HP. Damage at 0 HP causes a failed Death Saving Throw (or two if from a Critical Hit).
